EmailTemplate.subject: Seminar Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Public Safety Technology Seminar
NG9-1-1:Â Are You Ready? Hosted by Microsoft and TriTech Software Systems Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the NG9-1-1 Technology Seminar. We look forward to seeing you at the seminar. If there are others that you would like to join you, click here <http://offers.tritech.com/TX_NG911Seminar.html>to register them and save their space.
Date: Tuesday, December 11
Time: 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM
Bonus: Door Prizes, Refreshments and Lunch will be provided.
Address: Microsoft Facility - Austin 10900 Stonelake Boulevard Austin, TX Click here to view map <http://goo.gl/maps/XReSz>
Question? Michelle McClellan TriTech Software Systems (858)799-7900 michelle.mcclellan@tritech.com
